title: Engineer
description:
I'm **Nazar**, an ***Android Software Engineer*** 👨‍💻.
 I have over **5 years** 🗓️ of experience in creating native applications for Android OS 📱.  
The experience includes creating applications for such domains as: **video media production** 🎥, **utility management** 🔧, **transport logistics** 🚚, and **fintech** 💰.  

Technically, I'm cool with Kotlin and Java projects 🖥️, legacy XML projects 📂, or fresh Jetpack Compose 🎨. I love application architecture 🏗️ and implementing interesting features using camera 📸, notifications 🔔, services 📡, etc APIs 🌐.  

**Current stack**: Kotlin, Services, Jetpack Compose, Decompose, Coroutines, Retrofit, Flow, Koin, Clean Architecture, Ktlint, CI/CD 🛠️.

experience.name: VanOnGo
description: 1) Supported and maintained two high-load Android applications
2) Responsible for developing, maintaining features, and bug fixing
3) Maintaining and developing features for efficient location tracking, for custom user experience (Live Activity analogue)
4)  🏗 Focused on system design and efficient code implementation
5)  🛠 Worked extensively with next Stack: Kotlin, Coroutines, StateFlow, Jetpack Compose, Koin, Decompose, UDF, MVI

3) 🛠 Stack: Kotlin, Coroutines, Flow, XML, Jetpack Compose, MVI, Charts, Firebase
